32.eng-name: The Book of Jihad and Expeditions

chapter.ara-name: باب رَدِّ الْمُهَاجِرِينَ إِلَى الأَنْصَارِ مَنَائِحَهُمْ مِنَ الشَّجَرِ وَالثَّمَرِ حِينَ اسْتَغْنَوْا عَنْهَا بِالْفُتُوحِ
chapter.eng-name: The Muhajirun returned to the Ansar the gifts of trees and fruits when they became independent of means through the conquests
